      Tests if the changeLayer method correctly handles invalid or valid parameters

      Tests if Comm correctly initiates reconnect procedures

      Tests if the user parameters are correctly initialized to null and if changeLayer without a CommLayer initialized correctly does nothing

      Tests if the login method correctly handles login responses from the comm layer

      Tests if the logout method correctly closes the connection

      Tests if the logoutRequestReceived method correctly handles logout

      Tests if the tryRecover method correctly behaves when reconnection fails

      Tests if the send methods correctly push the objects to the queues

      Tests if the setters correctly alter the values of the user info
